prompt.description: Enter a base prompt and let NexusPrompt generate unique, professional variations using AI. Perfect for photographers, artists, and creators looking for fresh perspectives.
prompt.empty: Start by entering a prompt above
prompt.emptyDescription: We'll generate creative variations for you
prompt.enhanceDescription: Enable Enhance mode to improve your existing prompts
prompt.enhanceFeature1: Generates enhanced variations of the existing prompt
prompt.enhanceFeature3: Keeps the original prompt in the input field

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyRequired: To get started, please add your OpenAI API key in the settings.
settings.apiKeyDescription: This application requires an OpenAI API key to function. Your key is securely encrypted and stored only in your browser's local storage.
